forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. High around 10C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. High 49F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy this evening with showers after midnight. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain developing later in the day. High 54F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 51F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 13C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. SSE winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 47F. SSE winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 11C. NE winds shifting to S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 51F. NE winds shifting to S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
